name: densha-jisho-v2
description: This project intends to provide a combination of Japanese dictionary and flashcard reviewing application.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd dictionary-api && npm run dev" "cd dictionary-app && npm start"
scripts.alias: concurrently "cd dictionary-api && now alias" "cd dictionary-app && now alias"
scripts.postinstall: cd dictionary-api; npm i && cd ../dictionary/app; npm i
